column1: Uchi////One major advice - DON'T order the clam dish with potato chips.  I don't remember what it was called
column2: and it's no longer on the special menu.  Our server had recommended it
column3: and it was AWFUL.  It had the fishiest taste to it
column4: the sauce tasted like plain mayo with regular potato chips.  She saw that we barely touched it so she just took it off the menu.  She apologized for the bad suggestion...she had thought she'd "take a chance."  Why even take a chance on something so bad???
